scripts.build-clean: rm -fr dist dist-es6 && mkdir -p dist/packages dist-es6/packages
scripts.build-es6: babel src --out-dir dist-es6 --source-maps && babel packages --out-dir dist-es6/packages --source-maps
scripts.build-es5: babel src --out-dir dist --plugins=transform-es2015-modules-commonjs --source-maps && babel packages --out-dir dist/packages --plugins=transform-es2015-modules-commonjs --source-maps
scripts.build: npm run build-clean && npm run build-es6 && npm run build-es5
scripts.cover: NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter html --reporter cobertura --reporter=lcov npm run test-cover
scripts.lint: eslint src test && npm run lint-yarn
scripts.lint-yarn: !(grep -q unpm.u yarn.lock) || (echo 'Please rebuild yarn.lock file using public npmrc' && false)
scripts.publish-prod: npm run build && npm run test-fast && npm publish
scripts.publish-beta: npm run build && npm run test-fast && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test-node
scripts.test-cover: NODE_ENV=test tape -r babel-register test/node.js && nyc report
scripts.test-shader: npm run build-dist && budo src/test/fp64-shader.spec.js:build/test-bundle.js --dir test --live --open --port 3001 --watch-glob '**/*.{html,css,scss,js,glsl}' -- -t babelify -t brfs-babel
scripts.docs-gh-pages-force: git push origin `git subtree split --prefix _docs dev`:gh-pages --force
scripts.docs-publish: npm run docs-build && git add _docs -f && git commit -m 'UPDATE DOCS' --no-verify && npm run docs-gh-pages
